subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: To motivate the Rangers, Coach John Tortorella showed a reel of offensive highlights from the season. The tactic woke up the Rangers, who ended their skid with a win over the Devils.
snippet: To motivate the Rangers, Coach John Tortorella showed a reel of offensive highlights from the season. The tactic woke up the Rangers, who ended their skid with a win over the Devils.
